title: Ep. - 460 - DIRECTOR OF WHEN WE WERE BULLIES CRAIG CONOVER FROM SOUTHERN CHARM
description:
A coincidence led filmmaker Jay Rosenblatt to track down his fifth-grade class and fifth-grade teacher to examine their memory of and complicity in a bullying incident 50 years ago in the Academy Award nominated documentary When We Were Bullies. I speak with Jay more about this most moving film.

 

Southern Charm star Craig Conover discusses his new book Pillow Talk: What’s Wrong With My Sewing, his private battle against an Adderall addiction, and finding love with Paige DeSorbo from Summer House.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
